paragraph: Chris Duncan, is an Australian Scottish Fiddle player. He was described by The Age's Anna King Murdoch as being one of the "two really great Scottish fiddle players in the world." His album Fyvies Embrace - The Golden Age of the Scottish Fiddle won the 2000 ARIA Award for Best World Music Album.
